products.name: Aloe Vera Gel 100ml
products.description:
Aloe Pura Organic Aloe Vera Gel is your all-round skincare essential.
  • Soothing: It is packed with cooling, soothing, and replenishing properties, this versatile gel is perfect for your post-laser care routine.
  • Promotes Healing: Helps your skin recover quickly after laser hair removal.
  • Minimises Discomfort: Reduces redness and soothes irritation, leaving your skin feeling calm and refreshed.
  • Multi-Purpose Use: Ideal for hydrating, soothing sunburn, or calming sensitive skin.

products.name: Heliocare Gel Oil-Free SPF 50
products.description: This ultra-light mattifying gel absorbs quickly into the skin, providing a dry-touch, matte finish. Ideal for oily, combination, or spot-prone skin, it offers full-spectrum protection without causing breakouts, making it perfect for daily use in managing shine and oil.

products.name: Heliocare Water Gel SPF 50
products.description: This lightweight, water-based gel absorbs quickly, leaving a satin finish. Its advanced hydration system locks in moisture, and it creates a protective barrier against pollution. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and ideal for layering under makeup or for makeup-free days.

products.name: Heliocare Pigment Solution SPF 50
products.description: This light, silky fluid offers full spectrum protection while helping to prevent and reduce hyperpigmentation with a unique Depigmenting System. Combining Niacinamide and Ellagic Acid, it also includes a subtle tint to unify skin tone. Suited for skin types Fitzpatrick I-IV, it locks in moisture and protects against pollution.

products.name: Exfoliating Mitt (Teal)
products.description:
The traditional Moroccan Kessa glove, used to remove dead skin cells and impurities, promoting smoother and more radiant skin.
Benefits:
  • Prevents Ingrown Hairs
  • Removes Dead Skin Cells
  • Smooths Skin Texture
  • Improves Circulation
  • Enhances Product Absorption
